channel.title: Arduino on Robin Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on Robin Smith

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the first in hopefully a long series of posts in Arduino development as I learn about embedded development, microcontrollers, and electrical engineering. The hardware The target hardware for the experimentation will be this very Arduino Uno And, a quick look at the back will tell us that this is the R3 model However I believe any Arduino Uno model, as well as a few other Arduinos will work with the methods and APIs we’re using
